scripts.create-goerli-local: cp subgraph.yaml.goerli subgraph.yaml; graph create --node http://graph-node:8020/ sub2ethMappingTokenFactory/goerli
scripts.remove-goerli-local: cp subgraph.yaml.goerli subgraph.yaml; graph remove --node http://graph-node:8020/ sub2ethMappingTokenFactory/goerli
scripts.deploy-goerli-local: cp subgraph.yaml.goerli subgraph.yaml; graph deploy --node http://graph-node:8020/ --ipfs http://ipfs:5001 sub2ethMappingTokenFactory/goerli
scripts.create-ethereum-local: cp subgraph.yaml.ethereum subgraph.yaml; graph create --node http://graph-node:8020/ sub2ethMappingTokenFactory/ethereum
scripts.remove-ethereum-local: cp subgraph.yaml.ethereum subgraph.yaml; graph remove --node http://graph-node:8020/ sub2ethMappingTokenFactory/ethereum
scripts.deploy-ethereum-local: cp subgraph.yaml.ethereum subgraph.yaml; graph deploy --node http://graph-node:8020/ --ipfs http://ipfs:5001 sub2ethMappingTokenFactory/ethereum
